programme.title: Jim Wright and the Baltic rebellion
programme.short_synopsis: The beginnings of the rebellions in the Baltic states of Estonia and Lithuania.
programme.medium_synopsis: Gorbachev's offer to reduce Russian forces in Afghanistan, rebellions in Estonia and Lithuania, the student protests in Beijing, and the ethics hearing of Jim Wright.
